name: Butterscotch Banana Frozen Custard
description: Inspired by a friday night treat from Freddy's: a concrete of frozen custard, butterscotch, and banana
author: CheebaSteeba

reviews.text: Great recipe! Flavors on point super delicious. It's a bit muted for me but I'm pretty much flavor blind so I'm going to step it up a little the next time I make it. But I'm definitely making more then a 10ml next time!
Excellent job this is 1st recipe of yours i have tired and it did not disappoint

You did it again Cheebs, another banger. This is a very well balanced recipe imo. It is sweet and creamy without being cloyingly so. The banana meshes so well with the butterscotch. Good job on this killer recipe.
